categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Kabalian Cross was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer that served in the Imperial Navy. After transferring to a line command position in about 13 BBY, the Imperial officer Shea Hublin was assigned to serve aboard the Kabalian Cross. Hublin led a starfighter squadron from the bridge of the capital ship and during his time aboard the Kabalian Cross, he became known by the sobriquet "the Rebel Destroyer."
